messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] David Alpert goes to help
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the link.  (BTW, it s Albert, not Alpert). I too was annoyed at the abundant press on tourists, while I didn t see any coverage of the year-round
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the link. (BTW, it's Albert, not Alpert).

I too was annoyed at the abundant press on tourists, while I didn't see any coverage of the year-round residents. Not that it wasn't a tragedy for the tourists as well, but at least the ones who survived have homes and bank accounts to return to.

Mary Ellen
----- Original Message -----
For those of you interested in following the life of homeschooler David
Albert and his daughter as they arrive and travel in India post-disaster,
keep up with his blog:

http://shantinik.blogspot.com/

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
